meanings.definition: A small, decorative design or pattern punched into a postage stamp for security purposes.
meanings.sent1: The perfin on the stamp was a tiny flower shape.
meanings.sent2: Collectors often look for unique perfins on old stamps.
meanings.sent3: The perfin on the stamp seemed to wink at me mischievously.
meanings.sent4: The perfin added a touch of elegance to the plain stamp.
meanings.sent5: The intricate perfin made the stamp stand out from the rest.

meanings.definition: To punch a design or pattern into a postage stamp for security purposes.
meanings.sent1: She carefully used a tool to perfin the stamp with a heart shape.
meanings.sent2: Stamp collectors sometimes perfin their own stamps for fun.
meanings.sent3: He accidentally tried to perfin the stamp with a pen instead of a proper tool.
meanings.sent4: The machine can perfin hundreds of stamps in a minute.
meanings.sent5: Watching her perfin the stamp was oddly satisfying.
